hooks.text: My girlfriend said this pet psychic app was stupid, now she's begging me to read her hamster's mind

formulas.name: Bunny-Specific
formulas.effectiveness: High for bunny content - niche but engaged

principles.naturalLanguage: Must sound like something you'd say in conversation
principles.establishStakes: Why should reader care? Use reactions like FREAKED out instead of 'believes me'
principles.provideContext: Explain what the app does - 'read her hamster's mind' not 'do her hamster'
principles.specificDetails: Include details only the person and pet would know
principles.relationshipConnection: Person in hook must relate to reading content
